articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.title: Microsoft “Important Mail” email is a scam: How to spot it - Kurt the CyberGuy
articles.description: A fake Microsoft “Important Mail” email is spreading fast. Learn the red flags, what happens if you click and how to protect yourself now.
articles.content:
428
  • The email claims to be from Microsoft but uses fear and urgency to push a fast click.
  • Clear red flags include a generic greeting, a fake deadline, and a sender address from AOL.
